divs: sighting detailsthe friday after september 11, i was visiting my in-laws in franklin, wv. i noticed what appeared to be a military jet flying over the house above the trees. i climbed a hill behind the house and noticed two helicopters in the distance (<1 mile) flying in the vacinity of this red, stationary dot in the sky. i also noticed that two jets were making very wide circles around that same area. i ran down the hill to get my binoculars and when i returned, i could see, through the binoculars, a red orb (sphere) pulsating in the sky (i guess about 1\2 mile above the tree line). for the most part it remained stationary. once in awhile it would slowly move horizontally, but not a great distance (maybe 20 yards). the two helicopters monitored the orb from a distance. the two jets appeared to make wide, circular paths around the orb (i can't give you a distance, but the one jet would pass over the house about every 5 minutes). i watched the orb for 25 minutes but it didn't really change location. i ran down the hill to tell the family,, but they did not believe me. i did not return to see the craft again so i don't know how long it was there. there is a naval communications base in sugar grove, wv, not far from franklin. my father-in-law had seen a red orb one night when he was out plowing snow in pendelton county. he couyld not give me a year (1980s?). i could not tell what type of helicopters or airplanes that were in the sky. from my interest in jets and from seeing them in virginia beach, va, they at least sounded like military jets (a fighter type). since that sighting in 2001, i did see, a couple of years ago, a military type helicopter with no markings fly over franklin.
Summary: Red, pulsating sphere (orb) in air (stationary) monitored by two helicopters and a jet
trends: There have been no other sightings in Franklin
This sighting has never been favorited.
